'''1.0.1''' is a [[launcher]] version released twice on June 26, 2013. The first release was an unsuccessful attempt to enable [[Yggdrasil]]. Due to login errors, the launcher was downgraded to 1.0. The second release, however, was successful in enabling Yggdrasil.
